pkgmetadata.longdescription: =========Automaton=========.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/automaton.svg :target: https://pypi.org/project/automaton/ :alt: Latest Version.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/dm/automaton.svg :target: https://pypi.org/project/automaton/ :alt: DownloadsFriendly state machines for python. The goal of this library is to providewell documented state machine classes and associated utilities. The statemachine pattern (or the implemented variation there-of) is a commonlyused pattern and has a multitude of various usages. Some of the usagesfor this library include providing state & transition validation andrunning/scheduling/analyzing the execution of tasks.* Free software: Apache license* Documentation: https://docs.openstack.org/automaton/latest/* Source: https://opendev.org/openstack/automaton* Bugs: https://bugs.launchpad.net/automaton
